thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Garden in the city
thread.title_full: Garden in the city - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: divscu
title: Garden in the city
text:
Location, location, location! Midtown, near Macy's, easy access to subway, plenty of restaurants.
Room adequate, on small side but on 30th floor view of Empire State Building. Staff courteous and
helpful. Very pleasant one night stay at seasonal ,it reasonable price. Helps to be Hilton honors member!
